group_1.textLeft: Here.
Yes.@You'll help out here...
Err, [chara:301201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I mean train.@They'll train you here.
Very good... Ah, over there.@I will introduce you to the factory manager!
I've got a favor to ask today.@This is Tsuruno.
Nice to meet you!
He's in charge of this factory.

group_1.textRight: Good to meet you.@So you're the one who wants to work, eh?

group_1.textLeft: That's right!

group_1.textRight: She seems pretty energetic!@[chara:800900:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.5][chara:800900:cheek_0][chara:800900:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800900:lipSynch_1]But this is tough work. Can she handle it?

group_1.textLeft: She says she wants to become stronger.
She's tough.@She'll be fine.
Yeah! No Worries![chara:100301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]
There's a bunch of heavy things here.@Your job is to carry them.
Carry heavy things, get strong.
Makes sense...!@Okay, I'll get right to it!

group_1.textRight: Carry this over there.@You can use a hand truck if you want...

group_1.textLeft: Hup!@Got it!
Here I come!@Sorry! Behind you...![freeze:1][chara:100301:effect_slideOutRight]
(...A normal girl couldn't @carry something so heavy...)
(She is already very strong...@Or maybe she isn't a normal girl...?)
Hmm? @Oh, it's nothing.

group_1.textRight: Anyway, I'm so glad you brought her around!@We really needed the man...er...girlpower!
And she's got so much spirit and energy too!@She's brightening up the whole factory!

group_1.textLeft: No, thank you.@Sorry for the sudden request.

group_1.textRight: Oh no, don't say that! Anytime!
The Blue Seas Family has @always been so good to us!
